### useful VNC resolutions and aspect ratio ###
640x480   (4:3)
800x600   (4:3)
960x720   (4:3)
1024x576  (16:9)
1024x768  (4:3) (default)
1152x648  (16:9)
1280x720  (16:9)
1280x800  (16:10)
1280x960  (4:3)
1280x1024 (5:4)
1366x768  (16:9)
1440x900  (16:10)
1400x1050 (4:3)
1440x1080 (4:3)
1600x900  (16:9)
1600x1200 (4:3)
1680x1050 (16:10)
1856x1392 (4:3)
1920x1080 (16:9)
1920x1200 (16:10)
1920x1440 (4:3)
2048x1080 (256:135)
2048x1536 (4:3)
2560x1440 (16:9)
2560x1600 (16:10)
3840x2160 (16:9)
7680x4320 (16:9)
